about_the_game:
Maintain order and protect the prison with the S.O.R.T Gear Set for Security. This set includes six different cosmetic gear items:

  • S.O.R.T. Helmet
  • S.O.R.T. Gloves
  • S.O.R.T. Bottom
  • S.O.R.T. Boots
  • S.O.R.T. Patch
  • Baton Melee Weapon Skin
These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase and can be combined with other cosmetic gear pieces. They can be equipped in-game in the Customize menu which can be accessed from the main menu.

The S.O.R.T. Gear Set is included in the Glasshouse Set Bundle.
